name: Fashion Nation: Style & Fame
description:
Live your fashion dreams in Fashion Nation! 
Curate your style and build your dream wardrobe, gain fans and followers, and become the biggest celebrity model in the Nation! Once you style a fabulous outfit and pair it with the latest trends in hair & makeup, you’ll be ready to prove your fashion skills... Challenge other stylists! Put your skills to the test, vote for the best outfits, and climb up to the coveted status of Fashion Icon!

BUILD YOUR DREAM WARDROBE
Fill your closet with beautiful clothes, stunning shoes, unique jewelry, and eye-catching accessories! With thousands of pieces to choose from, you can develop your own personal style and create your own brand!

STYLE A WINNING LOOK
Dress for fabulous events by skilfully putting together pieces from our wide array of items into gorgeous looks! Whether you’re attending a VIP party, a red carpet or a beach in the Caribbean, dress to impress!

DUEL OTHER PLAYERS
Prove you’re at the top of the game by going head to head with other stylists! Dress up for the same event and see who gets more votes from the community and wins Best Dressed!

BE A FASHION CRITIC AND VOTE
Vote on who wore it best and decide who are the rising stars in Fashion Nation! Cast your vote on who picked the right outfit for the event and who styled a fashion faux-pas!

GAIN FOLLOWERS AND BUILD YOUR FAN BASE
Make sure your looks are #goals and gain more and more followers with every outfit! Climb up the hierarchy of the fashion world, influence the current trends, and decide what’s hot and what’s not!

Download Fashion Nation and starting ruling!
